name: com.castsoftware.nosqldotnet
title: Support of NoSQL for .Net technology
description: NoSQL support extension for .Net provides official support for MongoDB. The calculation of Function Points for your .NET analyzes using MongoDB will be improved through the creation of new objects and links specific to MongoDB, therefore the links from .Net to the database objects will be created. The extension provides also new quality rules concerning the best practices and the detections of risks related to the use of MongoDB.
